title: Whoa what the hell?
body:
Okay so...in ranked match...just started, and suddenly about 5 mins in, attempting to reconnect. Check my router, everything is fine, relog, and check my web, everything works normal, log back into league and the game is just gone completely.....what the hell? I'm  not concerned cause it just started, but what would make that happen?

o_o

replies.body:
YOU GOT DDOS'ed.





















jk dont actually know what happened soz bud :(
